H0.text: What is the chief ore used to make aluminium. Corundum

H1.text: What is the chief ore used to make aluminium. Cryolite

H2.text: What is the chief ore used to make aluminium. Garnet

H3.text: What is the chief ore used to make aluminium. Boxite

A4.text: Bauxite is the world's main source of aluminium and gallium.

A5.text: The Hall–Héroult process uses molten cryolite to extract metallic aluminium from alumina.
